Interactive Data Visualization

One of the most exciting parts of web development for me has been creating interactive charts. Below is an example of an interactive Plotly chart generated in Python.

item.title: This is an old post
item.description:
My Webpage with Three Columns

Welcome to my simple webpage! Below are three columns or blocks with text inside each.

## Column 1 This is the first column. You can place any text, links, or images here. - List item 1 - List item 2
## Column 2 This is the second column with some additional text. You can use **bold**, *italics*, or any other markdown syntax here.
## Column 3 The third column can contain paragraphs, bullet points, or other elements. > Example of a blockquote inside the third column.
